b"On further review of Italy-Switzerland, I feel pretty convinced that when Chiellini hangs up his boots we're in a major bind in defense.

Bonucci, great as he can be, isn't the same without Giorgio and the remainder has been wholly uninspiring thus far.

Someone needs to emerge."

\xf0\x9f\x9a\xa8Juventus defender Giorgio Chiellini is a doubt for the Champions League clash against Chelsea after the international break. He has arrived at Italy camp with an injury.
